Articles.Content: I have a weird problem with the advanced grabbing arm. Whenever I try to grab something, as soon as I do I get a weird cutscene where the camera just zooms out infinitely and I can't play anymore. All I can do is go to the menu and reload quicksaves. Has this happened to anyone else? It kind of looks like a Spore cutscene.

I haven't hear that specific reaction by the claw, but it is quite buggy. Unfortunately there isn't really a way to fix what you're describing. You can try launching another claw craft and give it another go.

What would be awesome to help us figure out more about this bug is if you could take a look at this thread: http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/92230-Stock-Support-Bug-Reporting-Guide

Posting .craft files or saves might help a lot.

Cheers,

~Claw
